mama "deyakara hasirima" gana kiwe, ee langata liyana lipi thula demawpiyanta dawa upadina daruwan athara wenasa pahadili kirimata ya.
anathurin sofiya ema sthanayedima miyagos thibuna athara, age 24 hawiridi yeheliya rohal gatha kirimen anathuruwa miyagos thibuni.

me oya ekka witharamayi mehema katha wath kale" kiwwa.

wayasa awurudu hathe di ohu siya piyagen chithra andima pilibandawa mul padam igena gaththeya.
mehi athishaya biyakaru paththa wanne mese piligatha haki hethu dakwimak idiripath wana thek kisidu piliyamak da no yedima ya.
eya mawa ananthawath dakala thiyenawa me grawund ekedi.
ewita kanthawange jiwithaya nirasayenma thamange natyayan wetha adiyamen siduwana bawa tharkayen thorawa thahawuru we.
ee prashansa labena wita ehi anithyathawa sihipath karannata daksha wiya yuthuyi.
me hethuwa matha rata pura pilima idikirimak siduwuye natha.
mata nan nikanuth mala wikara penawa.

ranil wikramasinha mahathage lekhawus komishan sabha kathawen balawath lesa kipunu ranjith wijewardhana mahatha pawasa aththe parani komishan sabha warthawan thawath athi bawath eewa dan nawatha karaliyata pamina athi nisa eewa prasiddha kirimata thamanta awashya nathi bawath, ranil wikramasinha mahathata awashya lesa ninditha lesa mahinda rajapaksha mahathata madagasana lesa puwath pala kirimata thaman sudanam nathi bawath, thawaduratath balapam kirimata aawoth mema maha mathiwaranaya sambandhayen thaman labagath anagatha prathipalaya penwana samikshana wartha awashya pudgalayan wetha kal thabama thaman wisin labadena bawathya.
